name: Image Sizer
short_description:
Purpose of Image Resizer is to resize images you DND(Drag and Droped) in seconds... If you have slow internet connection,(like we do in Serbia) this is perfect app for you. You can resize your images to any resolution, and then upload to any of your favorite social network...  

Image sizer uses special algorithms that "compress" image to maximum, so that image uses the minimum of your hard drive memory, and latter, minimum of your upload speed... 

Currently, Image sizer is available only in Serbia edition, but I am working on Translating it to English and German... 

If you have any suggestions, wishes, or "bad word" for this app, you can contact me at my email adress: 

imagesizer@gmail.com
summary: Image sizer - Resizes your images in second
